name: Issuance of removable windshield placard
text: §291-52  Issuance of removable windshield placard.  The issuing agency shall issue one removable windshield placard to each applicant who presents a certificate of disability that verifies that the applicant's disability is expected to last for at least six years.  The removable windshield placard shall expire six years after the date of its issuance. [L 1984, c 46, pt of §2; am L 1992, c 46, §4; am L 1997, c 308, §9; am L 1999, c 282, §6; am L 2001, c 297, §6; am L 2003, c 30, §4; am L 2006, c 269, §3; am L 2010, c 141, §5]
